description: While Mei is nervous when Yamato says they should act like a couple and holds her hand, she also experiences her first warm emotion.However, when they run into Yamato`s friends Muto Aiko and Tachikawa Masashi, the four of them end up going bowling. Aiko, who has feelings for Yamato, becomes irritated when she realizes Yamato is serious about Mei, and reveals a shocking bit of information to Mei...!?
